page.title: 13LANDSCAPE..RURAL LANDSCAPE
page.content: Farmscape dominates our area. Field sizes vary from 5 hectares to 20 hectares and field boundaries of hedgerows,stone dykes and fence add variety to the landscape. The higher parts of Mount Hill are left as rough grazing with woodland plantations which will mature and become more dominant. Throughout the area there are patches of deciduous woodland and it is pleasing to note that hardwood replanting is taking place to replace the old trees. Though some of our area is quite low lying no wetland remains. All of it has been drained for farmland. All in all,however, our rural landscape seems to acheive excellent farming output and at the same time provides ample cover for a varied wildlife.
